thread.title: 12 Perfect Bets for Austin Bar Snacks
thread.title_full: 12 Perfect Bets for Austin Bar Snacks

author: Nadia Chaudhury
title: 12 Perfect Bets for Austin Bar Snacks
text:
12 Perfect Bets for Austin Bar Snacks All Feb 21, 2017, 2:20pm CST Contigo's bar snacks Contigo/Facebook 
With drinking comes the need to eat. For those looking for something lighter than full-on meals, it’s time to search for perfect bar snacks . 
In Austin, this means offerings like the appropriately-named stoner snack from Whip In , sharable pizza from King Bee Lounge , Jeffrey’s deviled eggs and Lenoir ’s wine garden trailer with hush puppies. And yes, sharable pizza from King Bee are included. This update adds brisket cheddar cheese tater tots from EastSide Tavern , Winebelly ’s shishisto peppers, Workhorse ’s fried pickles (chips, not spears), and others. 
For more bar dining, check out Eater’s picks for the best bars with great food , happy hours, wine and cheese spots , charcuterie , plus oysters , French fries , chicken wings , deviled eggs , and queso . Then, for other drinking options, scope out cocktail bars both new and essential , beer destinations , dive bars , and restaurants and bars with killer wine lists . 
Everything below is listed in alphabetical order. Is your favorite bar snack missing? Let Eater know through the tipline , comments, or over on the forum . 1 Brisket Cheddar Cheese Tater Tots at EastSide Tavern 
EastSide Tavern combines smoked meats and bar snacks into one handy dish: the brisket cheddar tater tots, served with a side of spicy aioli. 1510 E Cesar Chavez St Austin, TX 78702
